name: Price & Quote
overview:
Price & Quote provides a cloud-based Pricing Engine, Quoting Engine, and Proposal and Contract Generation Engine with eSignature technology that can shorten your quote-to-cash lifecycle.

Price & Quote’s feature rich price management tools allow you to consolidate and easily manage pricing across your entire organisation in real time. Price & Quote’s proposal and content management tools allow you to ensure that your proposal and legal content is always accurate and up to date. Price & Quote’s sales collaboration tools help your sales, technical, operations and legal teams to collaborate easily on sales opportunities by making quotes, proposals and contracts available for collaboration anytime, anywhere.

The Price & Quote Sales Engine allows you to:

-Accelerate cash flow by streamlining the sales, quoting, proposing, contracting and signing process, from quote to cash -Reduce unnecessary paperwork -Reduce order errors -Support all sales channels -Increase sales through collaborative selling -Take control of the pricing and quoting process with integrated approvals, discounting rules, real time pricing and more -Monitor sales opportunities, quotes, proposals, and contracts in real time -Accelerate “quote-to-cash” -Ensure speed, accuracy, consistency of quotes and proposals
